author: Ronald Quinlan
title: WeWork Dublin offices stay open while own staff work from home
description: Flexible workspace provider provides clients with ‘virtual support’ by email and phone
content:
Flexible workspace provider WeWork has introduced a work-from-home policy for employees across its Dublin office network as part of its efforts to deal with the impact of the Covid-19 crisis.
